meanings.definition: A type of marine animal with a long, soft body and tentacles for feeding.
meanings.sent1: Holothurians can be found in oceans around the world.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study holothurians to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The holothurians at the aquarium were having a 'tentacle party'.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the sea, holothurians dance gracefully among the corals.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the holothurians' unique appearance.

meanings.definition: The class of echinoderms that includes sea cucumbers.
meanings.sent1: Holothurians are fascinating creatures that live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The holothurians in this class have interesting feeding habits.
meanings.sent3: At the echinoderm party, the holothurians were the life of the sea.
meanings.sent4: Among the echinoderms, holothurians are the gentle giants of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The holothurians gracefully moved through the water, like underwater dancers.
